about_the_game:
Summary

Chat with five sexy girls, carefully choosing your answers as you talk with them through a series of engaging back and forths. First you learn of their personalities, then their kinks, before they reveal their deepest, most perverted desires.

Flirt with Five Girls, end up with One

The story is separated into five chapters, each chapter including a series of back and forth dialogues with each girl. At the end of each story chapter, one girl is removed from the choices, narrowing the selection as well as making the remaining girls all that closer to the player's heart. By the end of the fifth chapter, things get quite heated, and the player ends up with one of the five girls in a sex scene of their choosing.

Sexy Outfits

The further the player gets with a girl's story, the more intimate and comfortable she gets with them, wearing increasingly lewder outfits with each story chapter.

Replayability

Even after finishing the game, and ending up with a girl, it is possible to replay it from the start to unlock further dialogue options with other girls, end up with another girl at the end of the fifth flirt story chapter eventually allowing the player to unlock all animated 3D scenes and Sex scenes.

25 Sexy 3D scenes

At the end of each flirt with each girl, a new, sexy 3D scene will be unlocked, with freely adjustable camera to view the girl from any and all angles in it. These 3D scenes reveal more of each girl's personality.

15 Sex Scenes

Finishing a flirt with a girl up until the end of the 5th chapter will reward you with 3 sex scenes with her as the player ends up with that girl. These 3 sex scenes remain for the player, allowing them to view them again at any time, even after resetting their progress to start over.

The Girls

Komori, the Punk Vampire Girl

A lead singer to an underground punk band, Komori is a real daredevil, all about creating some real excitement, more than most would prefer. The catch? Rumors are, that she may or may not be an actual vampire, her favorite beverage being the living blood of her fans. If it is true, it's not really kept a secret, as her band is filled with bat and vampiristic motives.

Sora, the Soaring Angel Girl

A girl with an innocent face, Sora is quite the submissive type. She wants nothing more than a strong, dominant guy she can rely on and cuddle up with on cold nights. As for the hot summer nights, her loose clothes barely hang onto her, and as she soars in the skies, she enjoys being free from all bounds in more ways than one. This carefreeness can often come at a cost however.

Kemuriko, the Jiang-shi Girl

If ignorance is bliss, this girl is in the high heavens of joy, as she has lost all memories of her previous life. Wanting to make the most of her second chance at life, she has returned through whatever dangerous practices, wanting nothing more than to live joy, spread joy, and to suck chi. As it so happens, semen is a very valid source of chi to keep her happy and sated, if only her partner can keep up with her.

Jochu, the Diligent Hardworker

Nothing pleases her more than doing her best, pushing herself to the limits for those she loves. A jack of all trades, master of none, but a master of hardwork, Jochu has been through many, entirely different vocations. Not finding her calling in any of them, she has realized that it was always the people she enjoyed that surrounded her. A true people pleaser, that surely would not mind satisfying her man in any way he desires.

Ryoko the Gym Muscle Girl

The strongest of the girls, Ryoko is a true tomboy, spending most of her time working on her physique in the gym, and winning female natural bodybuilding competitions as her passion. She is a true lifter, and will at least prove a mighty fine competition for control, for any that would end up with her in bed.

content_descriptors.notes:
The whole game revolve around sexuality e.g.
* the icons and user interface
* the story 
* the characters
* the adult cutscenes

In some scene interactions between 2 or more adults are shown.  The erotic movements and nudity of women are  frequent in the game. In the dialogues the sexuality also there in a mid level.

No violence and drug in the game.

name: 5 Girls, 1 Honey

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: INTEL® Pentium Dual Core G3250
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any with dx11 support
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX9c compliant

short_description: Start a flirting spree with 5 girls, end up with 1 lover; Remove 1 from your potential interests at the end of each story chapter until you end up with a single girl you are dedicated to... And have dirty sex with her!
